Therefore the surveyId prevents reusing this signature in other networks or contractsThe front-end will filter by equal submissions, so with on a replay attack, additional submissions will be ignored"},"submit(bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Answers are encoded as a multichoice each hex character of the bytes32 array 0x13000000... nodes.documentation: @dev surveyId is the hash of the file in IPFS multihash
nodes.name: Submission

nodes.documentation:
@dev Answers are encoded as a multichoice each hex character of the bytes32 array
 0x13000000... Means the second option of the first question and the fourth of the second.

 0x13000000... Means the second option of the first question and the fourth of the second.

delegatedSubmit

delegatedSubmit(bytes32,bytes32,address,.details: Allow users with no ETH to participate in the survey The user parameter is not necessary but ensures correct submissions The Metamask signing scheme is changing quick and there's risk of submissions producing wrong signer addressesThe surveyId is the content hash of the survey IPFS has which contains this contract's address and the network ID. Therefore the surveyId prevents reusing this signature in other networks or contractsThe front-end will filter by equal submissions, so with on a replay attack, additional submissions will be ignored

submit(bytes32,bytes32).details: Answers are encoded as a multichoice each hex character of the bytes32 array 0x13000000... Means the second option of the first question and the fourth of the second.
